Package com.g24.main.product

Class Product

java.lang.Object
com.g24.main.product.Product
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
InternationalProduct, NationalProduct
public abstract class Product
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
Defines a product and its properties
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected float comission
    The profit of the trip for the company; must be a float in the range ]0,inf]
    protected java.lang.String departurePlace
    The place of departure
    protected java.lang.String designation
    The trip's name
    protected int duration
    The number of days of the trip
    protected float enterprisePrice
    The price payed by the company for the trip
    protected float userPrice
    The amount of money a normal user will have to pay with the comission included
    protected float VIPdiscount
    A discount for the VIP users; must be a float in the range [0,1[
    protected float VIPprice
    The user's price with the VIP's discount

    • modifyTrip

      public static void modifyTrip​(java.util.ArrayList<Product> productList, int index)
      Modifies the trip to new values. -1 must be typed in each new parameter to keep the same value
      Parameters:
      productList - the list of products
      index - the index of the product in the productList to modify

    • addProduct

      public static void addProduct​(java.util.ArrayList<Product> productList, boolean isNationalProduct)
      Adds a new product to the productList
      Parameters:
      productList - the productList
      isNationalProduct - true if a national product is to be added and false if an international product is to be added
